description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Yo Moron, get your finger out of your nose and let us prove your foot size is actually larger then your IQ. Beat 6 levels and 50 moron challenges to solidify your status as "Smart As Bait". Yo momma might think you're dumb as dirt, but your chance is here to prove your worth.
